author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is to start exercising Tracker alcareco producers in the phase-2 workflows, as there is interest in trying a preliminary alignment with the phase-2 geometry.
A minimal set of changes if proposed in order to achieve that goal, including the necessary update of the `phase2_realistic` autoCond key in order to get most updated trigger bits from the run-3 global tag (see also [cmsTalk](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/outdated-alcarecotriggerbitsrcd-payload-in-the-phase-2-simulation-global-tag/16749)):
   * Global Tag difference: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/125X_mcRun4_realistic_v2/125X_mcRun4_realistic_v3

In addition the pseudo-rapidity range of the alignment alcarecos is modified in the case of the phase-2 tracker to allow full coverage (up to ||<4).

#### PR validation:

Run successfully `runTheMatrix.py -l 20834.0 -t 4 -j 8`
